Download Receitas

Source: R/download_data.R
download_receitas.Rd

Download Receitas

download_receitas(year = NULL, ...)

Arguments

year

character between 2013 and 2019
...

additional parameters

Value

data.frame

Examples


(x <- download_receitas(year = 2014))
#>       codigo_orgao_superior      nome_orgao_superior codigo_orgao

if (FALSE) {
 (x <- download_receitas(year = "2014"))
 (x <- download_receitas(year = 2014, month = 2))
}
